long_description: The Nikon Monarch 3 10 x 42 binoculars feature powerful magnification and bright, high-resolution views from the first light of dawn until the last glimmer of dusk. Phase-corrected, highly reflective silver-alloy multicoatings on the prisms offer clear, high-contrast images that preserve accurate colors. Fully multicoated lenses deliver enhanced brightness and resolution. Ergonomic styling is mated with a rubber-armored exterior, providing added shock resistance and a firm grip whether wet or dry. Large, central focus wheel and adjustable diopter make focus easy to achieve and maintain, even while wearing gloves. Click-stop rubber eyecups, complemented by long eye relief, allow the binoculars to be used comfortably when wearing glasses. Nikon Monarch 3 10 x 42 binoculars are O-ring sealed and nitrogen-purged for waterproof, fogproof performance; flip-down objective-lens covers help protect optics.
short_description: The Nikon Monarch 3 10 x 42 binoculars feature powerful magnification and bright, high-resolution views from the first light of dawn until the last glimmer of dusk.
